info.title: Elastic Email SMTP API
info.description: API for sending and management email.

get.description: Get the status of an email message

parameters.name: message_id
parameters.description: The ID of the email message.

parameters.name: showdelivered
parameters.description: true - This will return all the recipients who succeeded.

parameters.name: showdetails
parameters.description: true  - This will return all recipients for each status.

parameters.name: showerrors
parameters.description: true - This will return all the recipients who bounced with details on why

parameters.name: showfailed
parameters.description: true - This will return all the recipients who bounced.

parameters.name: showpending
parameters.description: true - This will return all the recipients still in progress.
